title: Can information communication technology replace the teacher? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, definitely not for teaching school children. A live teacher is required to facilitate their learning. Cuemath offers both online and offline classes to facilitate school-going children to learn math. We use technology to facilitate learning. Our classes are live, interactive and personalised. This ensures instant doubt clarification and hence, better learning. Every student has their own learning pattern. Recorded or fixed learning material will not be suitable for all. If it were, students would have understood what was being taught in the classroom Besides, interaction with a live person makes the student more confident. The teacher motivates and guides the student in the right direction. To know more about Cuemath and to sign up, pl follow the link provided in my profile.
